  • Method Details

    • addGameStatusListener

      public static void addGameStatusListener​(GameStatusListener listener)
      Adds a game status listener to the list of listeners.
      Parameters:
      listener - the game status listener to be added

    • removeGameStatusListener

      public static void removeGameStatusListener​(GameStatusListener listener)
      Removes a game status listener from the list of registered listeners.
      Parameters:
      listener - the game status listener to be removed

    • informListeners

      public static void informListeners()
      Informs all registered game status listeners by calling their update method.

    • startGame

      public static void startGame()
      Starts the game by setting the paused status to false and performing the initial action.

    • selectPawn

      public static void selectPawn​(String code)
      Selects a pawn with the specified code if the game is not paused, it's the selection phase, and the game is not over. If conditions are met, it calls the controller's selectPawn method with the provided code and performs the next action.
      Parameters:
      code - the code of the pawn to select

    • playShot

      public static void playShot​(int line, int column)
      Plays a shot at the specified line and column if the game is not paused, it's the play phase, and the game is not over. If conditions are met, it calls the controller's playShot method with the provided line and column, displays the shot on the board, and checks if the game is finished. If the game is not over, it performs the next action.
      Parameters:
      line - the line where the shot is played
      column - the column where the shot is played

    • undo

      public static void undo()
      Undoes the last move, pauses the game, and performs the next action.

    • redo

      public static void redo()
      Redoes the last undone move, pauses the game, and performs the next action.

    • addMove

      public static void addMove​(String move, ImageIcon icon)
      Adds a new move to the list of move components.
      Parameters:
      move - the move to add
      icon - the icon representing the move

    • clearMoves

      public static void clearMoves()
      Clears the list of move components.

    • getMoveComponents

      public static List<MovePanel> getMoveComponents()
      Retrieves the list of move components.
      Returns:
      the list of move components

    • pauseGame

      public static void pauseGame()
      Pauses the game if it's not in PvP mode and notifies the listeners.

    • resumeGame

      public static void resumeGame()
      Resumes the game if it's not over and performs the next action.

    • isPaused

      public static boolean isPaused()
      Checks if the game is currently paused.
      Returns:
      true if the game is paused, false otherwise

    • isPvP

      public static boolean isPvP()
      Return true if both players are humans
      Returns:
      true if player vs player and false if one of the players is an ai

    • hintClicked

      public static void hintClicked()

    • isHintClicked

      public static boolean isHintClicked()
